snippet.title: Super Mario's Wacky Worlds (CD-i) (Beta) - All Levels
snippet.description:
WARNING: Not a finished game, made this just to show off what could of been. Don't downvote for crappy gameplay this game is unfinished and I can't make it suck less (sorry)

My goal was the get some decent quality gameplay of this game as the images/video I have cropped up were crap.

Ok so I messed up when doing the music so the first minute of gameplay is the start up audio (forgot to cut it). I captured aprox. 10 mins of audio from audacity from this game (all the music in this game) and then looped it to fill the whole video. There is supposedly jumping sounds however my play-through did not have any. 

This game is about 30% complete for more info: http://www.mariowiki.com/Wacky_Worlds

I glitch and clip my way to get to areas lacking proper platforms. My controls were crap so forgive the weird behavior and drawn out levels. The levels I skipped are not finished and are unplayable. 

If you have any request for other weird games I'm sure I can figure out how to play it.
